title: God Has a Plan for Your Strong-Willed Child
itunes:summary:
If you're parenting a strong-willed child, you know there are unique challenges that come with their bold opinions and emotions. John and Danny give an overview of principles for parenting strong-willed children. Featuring Wendy Speake and Amber Lia.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Triggers: Exchanging Parent's Angry Reactions for Gentle Biblical Responses" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-05-11?try=1&refcd=1100002

Get more resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/god-has-a-plan-for-your-strong-willed-child/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
